sourcesContent:
// src/theme.js
export const THEME = {
BG_DARK: "#000000ff",       // soft background for pages
 BG_LIGHT: "#F9FAFB",
  CARD_BG: "#FFFFFF",         // clean white for cards/sections
  TEXT_PRIMARY: "#1E293B",   // neutral dark slate (replaces black)
  TEXT_SECONDARY: "#64748B", // subtle gray-blue for paragraphs
  ACCENT: "#CDAA4E",         // soft gold (highlight)

  ACCENT_DARK: "#B8963F",    // darker gold (hover)
  PRIMARY: "#1E3A8A",         // deep blue (main brand)
  PRIMARY_LIGHT: "#3B82F6",   // gentle modern blue accent

  SOFT_BORDER: "#E5E7EB",         // soft neutral lines

  MUTED_BG: "#F3F4F6"
};
